Html:
Hello guys!

i have one question ; how i change the cross in the center of map ?   have two cross  one red and one blue ..

i want put one picture in the red cross  place..  

i see function Gmap Control and GMarkerCross  but  no sucess with this classes ... please someone give me one light

Thanks in advanced.

Hi radioman ! how are you ? 
i hope fine.

So .. you know that crossmarker  in the center of map ?  i think she are created in  Gmap Control and GMarkerCross 
is one blue and red  


i want change that marker for one picture.  ...   im trying trying without sucess.


very hopefull if you help me!

Thanks in advanced ! you are the best!

could be better ;}

..anyway you have to create custom marker using bitmap or reuse GMarkerGoogle, to turn off default center map.ShowCenter = false, or you can ovveride OnPaintOverlays and render whatever you want instead
